website_summaries.verdict: Fuji's FinePix Z10fd might be the cutest sub-$200 snapshooter out there, but you can get better image quality from some other similarly priced cameras.

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine from DJsDealAlerts... Item was as described... Works great!... Another satisfied customer! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine from DJsDealAlerts... the packaging, shipping and camera condition was great! The camera is very easy to use, plus it shoots great close-ups. Close-ups was my main reason for getting this type of camera. The reason I put this here was because I waited too long to give DJsDealAlerts here on Amazon a 5 star rating. I am very very satisfied with DJsDealAlerts and Amazon for the camera I bought. Again, it's great for close-ups. I had taken a picture of a penny and I could see every scratch and dent on it clearly and up close... That's how good this type of camera is...
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Red eye removal doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a disappointment. I have a Z5 and got this for the red eye removal. The face detection frequently will not detect the face of a child because a child's face moves a lot. The red eye is not removed unless the face is detected. Even when the face is detected the red eye is often not removed. I love the Z5 I have, and other than the red eye removal I like this camera also. The camera will provide a slide show with music accompaniment. Small size and great user interface are good features.
customer_reviews.author: Been Heavy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: My previous pink camera worked so much better than this orange camera
customer_reviews.text: This item was what I expected at first but after some use, the battery started dying a lot faster. I had this same camera in pink but I lost it so I got this one to replace it. My previous pink camera worked so much better than this orange camera. I'm not sure if I got a faulty product but I am not happy with it. Every other feature worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I loved the color! It doesn't take pictures well with any type of noise back ground. They all seem to be blurry. It takes great pictures outside, but this camera is very sensitive to lighting indoors. I love the big screen to view pictures, but wish that it had easier viewing options. I also bought this camera in pink and orange for my sister and mom. They all have the same issues with their cameras as well. Overall it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent novice camera.
customer_reviews.text: Has the automatic controls that a novice fotographer needs. If you want easy switching of program modes or video mode, you had better learn the menu navigation. The buttons are limited in scope, and not very user friendly. If you want to take good pix, this is great because it can even take two of the same pose, one with flash and one natural. Great for wedding guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is great! Small, compact and takes excellent photos. And with the SD cards (I bought mine on Amazon.com) being so cheap, it makes this camera a must have. One issue, is that you have to make sure you review the instructions, at first I had a lot of blurry photos. There's an anti-blur feature- make sure it's on. Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... that something so little can do so much so easily. That said
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of remarkable that something so little can do so much so easily. That said, image quality is not sufficiently high to record what I needed it to with the required clarity. Many camera phones take sharper, less grainy images.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Dave

customer_reviews.title: cute camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased for my daughter for Christmas. She likes it and it takes good pictures but the software that goes with it is hard to work with. She has accidentally deleted several pictures even though she has used digital cameras and lots of software programs before. Turns out the software is not as user-friendly as the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my granddaughter's birthday that's coming up but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter's birthday that's coming up but learned from her Dad that she is trying to get away from anything girly (pink included). Now I have to find something else. I tried taking picture and the camera works o.k.
customer_reviews.author: Sandic

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's absolutely great. I haven't had any problems with it whatsoever and the battery doesn't take as long to charge as most other cameras. It takes awesome photos and it's so easy to use. The only complaint that I would have about this camera is that it doesn't zoom in as much as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Deena Lettas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for my wife's Christmas gift. First off, the price was almost $50 cheaper than Best Buy's after Thanksgiving ad. The user friendlyness and picture quality are superb. Matter of fact , Im ordering a second one of these in black for me. An awesome camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several years ago and forgot to write a review. My kids still use it today because it is small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a Christmas present for myself from my husband. It is in my favorite color, BLUE. I have been a camera addict since I was 10 years old, when I was presented with my first camera by my equally camera-addicted uncle, Victor. I found it extremely easy to use. The screen is big, and it is so simple to download to my Mac (iPhoto). I carry this camera everywhere for quick snapping. The feature that I look forward to using the most is the continuous shot mode.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift seem to like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Merle Kay Hulse

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: For about little over $100, this camera is a great buy, perfact for fast home snap shots, with web friendly formats etc...uses cheap sd cards and come with some nice feature set ( almost too much features ) but can't beat it for the price !
customer_reviews.author: B. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera a few years ago for my wife, but I ended up using it quite a bit as well. It's been great as a small compact and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilcock

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Sharp, EZ to use
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 17yr old and she filled a 1gb card in 24hrs. She has used it outdoors at events and indoors where no flash is permitted and still achieved good images. I know the professional Fuji cameras are based on Nikons, so perhaps the companies are sharing technology. Would explain the great pics... The HOT BLUE color makes quite a splash too. Good Deal!
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: cute camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter as a 14th birthday present. It is absolutely adorable, the color matches her phone & ipod. The pictures are great, but we are having issues with the video. Admittedly, this could be a user error since we have not read the manual. However,this will be the first camera that we have to read a manual. All other cameras worked fine with a minimum of fumbling around. Once we figure it out, the camera will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Missa

customer_reviews.title: Dependable for several years now
customer_reviews.text: Ownes this camera for several years now and it is still working great and takes awesome photos !
customer_reviews.author: AegisFang

customer_reviews.title: Poor shot quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no photography buff, I just wanted a point-and-shoot camera that would take decent pictures at parties and outdoor events. This camera is not it. Very, very poor shot quality no matter which mode I use. Pictures look ok in their original state but if you zoom in at all the crappiness is instantly revealed. I will be putting mine up for sale on eBay and getting something else as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Bought as a Christmas gift for my wife, she wanted a hot pink phone so I bought her this one, she loved it! Great quality pics and many picture options as well, computer software easy to install and camera is easy to use. Only con is that I feel the rechargeable battery it comes with should be able to last longer than it does. Other than that, one of the best cameras you can find in this color and I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and this item is something that fulfills my needs for what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Photo quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: It has all the goods of a portable P&S, but the photo quality is bad with poor colors. Menu selection is not user-friendly either.
customer_reviews.author: kuoch

customer_reviews.title: Nice... worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: After much research, Amazon was definitely the cheapest price. Not a lot of features, but does the job. Flash is almost too bright, pictures taken with the flash are super bright,,, which makes for an unusual pic if you are in a club... fits nicely in an ipod sock. Also, the case not black so much as it is dark plum.
customer_reviews.author: E. Card

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, lousy battery-life!
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. The pictures are great but the battery didn't even last a full day of picture taking. The battery only lasted about 3 hrs or 150 pics. I ended up buying an extra battery to take on my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Grande Dame

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Finepix Z10 Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is absolutely fantastic. I bought it for our trip out west. We came back home with over 400 beautiful pictures. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Seachelle

customer_reviews.title: Sleek!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad buy. The zoom though is a little disappointingly close range. Also, the face recognition can be a little confusing but once you figure out how it works, this is a nifty sleek gadget. Sure better than my previous Finepix Z3.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis K. Ntale

customer_reviews.title: really bad camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera takes terrible pictures the screen shows them with what looks like a film over them and the do not show up any better once they are down loaded to the computer or printed out. I have a 3.2mp digital that takes better pitcures. You will be disaponted if you get this camera. Fujifilm really messed up with this one.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix
customer_reviews.text: This camrea is easy to use with lots of Picture opitins to pick from. The only thing Im not impressed with it the quality of the pictures. Many have turned out fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: audreo

customer_reviews.title: digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this camera for very long but so far I love it. It takes awesome pictures and it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great point and click camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter for her 11th birthday. We both love the camera, bought a memory card to expand how many pictures and videos it can hold. We can easily download the pictures from the camera to our MySpace pages and other picture sharing sites like Dropshots. The video isn't the best quality but for us, it works fine. BUT...we are not technical, are not looking for the best and WERE looking for a camera that would do what we needed it to do for a reasonable price. We found those things with this camera. And the battery life is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girlie

customer_reviews.title: This camera is not worth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because of the attractive color (green) and based on the reviews I came across. However, when I got it here to be honest I was quite disappointed. The camere make noise while zooming, and could not perform well while taking macro shots. Compared to my old 6.1MP Nikon, the Fuji is behind in picture quality and overall performance. It takes longer for the software to process the images taken. The Face Detection feature is almost useless, it is a good concept but it was poorly executed. For the money, in my oppinion, you could get a better camera. Might want to consider the Casio, Canon, Nikon or Sony units from the same price range!
customer_reviews.author: Ivaylo

customer_reviews.title: Cute camera doesn't deliver
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered this camera for my teenage daughter's birthday based on Fuji's reputation for consistently delivering good quality cameras, and the fact that my daughter loved the styling. After using the camera for a few weeks it was actually my daughter that came to me with concerns about the picture quality. Indoor shots with flash were especially poor and grainy. So back to Amazon it went, and we got a Canon SD1000 to replace it which we are thrilled with.
customer_reviews.author: Barchetta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Camera has great features (anti-blur, framing help, etc.) for the price. One to keep in your pocket on trips! Zooms in and out to capture wider and tighter shots. Quick download capability (even worked with program already on my computer, so I never needed to download the included disc. Although, if I do, I do believe there are special features included in the Fuji that I can use to enhance and edit photographs). Only one complaint--the camera's color looks like it is fading from black to a purle hue. That's okay, though.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good pics
customer_reviews.text: I had an olympus 7 megapixel digital camera that turned out to need a lot of manipulation before it took a decent picture. I finally gave up on it and bought this one because my sister has it and her pictures always came out much better than mine. I'm glad I did because this one is much easier to use, just point and click and you get great pictures. No need to fuss with the settings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: no flash = bad pictures!
customer_reviews.text: this is a decent camera for the price my only complaint is that if you like taking pictures in natural light (no flash) expect grainy noisy pictures. and just my luck i love to take pictures without a flash =[ .. all the other features of this camera are great! it's very compact and easy to use. i got it in wasabi green and i have to say it's a beautiful color! for a point and shoot this camera would definitely serve it's purpose..it also takes nice videos. just be warned if you like taking digital pictures with low lighting affects and no flash it will be a major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: K. radford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this camera badly. The design of the camera was perfect for my needs - cute, compact, with a lens cover. I wanted a "purse camera" for spontaneous snaps of my son, and this seemed to fit the bill perfectly. Even though I wasn't looking for anything of professional quality, the image quality was so poor that I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! The days of out of focus pictures are gone - the picture stabilazation feature is great. So is the multiple face focus. So far I haven't found anything I dislike about this camera. Nice compact size with a view screen that is easy to see & use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cirolia

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect too much
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very compact and light weight camera ideal for taking photos of unimportant occasions. But for this price, one should not expect tact sharp images. Pros: Very good macro performance. Face detection (if it can detect)provides very good exposure and focusing under ideal lighting conditions. Cons: Very slow low light focusing, too much high iso noise (including iso 400), extensive loss of sharpness on the far right and left edges in wide angle shots and some purple artifacts on vertical lines of buildings.
customer_reviews.author: Durukan Payzanoglu

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My goal with this purchase was to find a pocket size camera that is easy to use with good photo quality. This is it! I normally purchase more professional grade cameras and really wasnt sure if I would enjoy this purchase. I have been impressed with everything so far. My favorite thing about it is that it fits easily into my purse or pocket and is not bulky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointing but overal great
customer_reviews.text: If you are just putting pictures of Facebook or any other social networking site then this camera is for you. If your plans are more than just pictures of that sort then I would not recomend this camera. It takes great pictures but the software that comes with it is not so great. I wish I would have done a little more research and not just bought it because of the color but still it is a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: twowingsup

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after shopping around for a while. I knew I wanted a good camera, and I was wanting a pink one. I am in love with this thing! It's great for me! If I need to sell stuff, I really enjoy the auction mode because it automatically takes smaller size pics and therefore it's easier to upload into the auction! It's also a wonderful shade of pink! I know I will be enjoying this camera for a while!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Stitzer

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, it has great picture quality and it's user friendly. All of the pictures I take are very crisp and clear and it's perfect for any time of day, any light inside and outside. I absoultly would not trade this camera in for the world and I think if you're making the decision wether to buy this or not that you have found the perfect camera for you and you should go ahead and buy it, you won't be disappointed. And I'm not an easy sell either.
customer_reviews.author: A. Greer

customer_reviews.title: I, really like the camera. Its small and handy. Wish someone would make a case that would protect the viewing screen.
customer_reviews.text: As I mentioned above, I like the camer, its small and light and can easily be carred in a pants pocket. I took it to Costa Rica the day after I receive the order from Amazon and worked through the instructions. I have a larger FujiFilm camer and the control function are nearly the same so the learning curve was fairly shallow. Again like the Camera and I will buy futur Fuji products.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Prout

customer_reviews.title: Finepix(wave blue)
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very nice.It takes great pictures and with a memory card you can record up to an hour of video.My girlfriend loves this camera and is trigger happy.Tons of pictures have gone on My Space already.This is the first Fuji product I have purchased and I was not disappointed.I recommend it for the price and the looks.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camara
customer_reviews.text: I love this camara even though I haven't used it much. Its face focus is awesome! It has many anemities to use to help make the perfect picture. Red eye, flash, face focus, blur button, etc...It also make videos and you can add your voice to it. You can download pics to your computer or straight to the printer and even to your TV!! I have no problems with this and can't wait to use it more!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Flint

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera will do what you need it to do as long as nothing goes wrong. The customer care people at fuji bounce you from one person to another and will do everything in their power not to help you. For this reason I would not recommend any fujifilm camera and I would look at the Canon, Nikon, or Olympus brands. Compared to fuji their customer service is like night and day. Hope this helps. Jason Logue
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty decent...
customer_reviews.text: The camera works fine. It's not something very extravagent...It does it's job. The quality of the pics could be slightly better...However, they do look wonderful when hooked up to a TV. I'd recommend it to someone looking for a camera to take random pictures. You do get your money's worth, but don't expect spectacular pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: 2 years old now and still great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in November 07 and everything is still the way it was back then, "Great!" I use Canon DSLR's for my business but I always carry the fuji in my pocket when I am out and about and it has never disappointed me. It is a great camera
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Churchwell

customer_reviews.title: Finepix Z10
customer_reviews.text: After researching cameras to purchase for my teenage daughter I decided to go with the Fujifilm Finepix Z10fd. Many of the stores were out of this product due to it's popularity. Not only was I able to find it available on Amazon it was also the best price both online and in the stores. I am very pleased with my purchase of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got my daughter this camera for Christmas. I searched many and didn't want to spend a fortune for one because she is 13 and 13 year olds are not always as careful as they should be. Well, I liked it so much that I am waiting for one for me to be delivered because I ordered one for myself. It is a great camera at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Lund

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. Nice and small, but it has so many cool features. Amazing color, too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy just because it is a Fuji
customer_reviews.text: this camera is small, compact, light, but sadly it doesnt take crystal clear images... i've taken more than 100 trial shots in different modes and circumstances however this camera is far from satifying the minimum...evening shots are really bad...forget taking sharp landscape photos with it...the only good results you may get are with macro shots... it was a wrong choice...my recommendation to those who are thinking of buying this digital cameara is to think twice...
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Kava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old daughter bought this camera and LOVES it. She does not read instructions and has still had great success with a lot of the features. It is very easy to use and understand. The image stabilization is good, the picture quality is beautiful, and the video feature is a lot of fun. Great camera, great price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rom

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for point and shoot. Very user friendly and great for pre-teens like my daughter. I have a 2MB card for it shooting up to 30 minutes of video. My daughter loves this camera. Also, the internal battery is a great plus - you don't have to buy any AA or AAA batteries. This camera has many plus features.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: pocket picture time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, it isn't quite the quality of my much more expensive and huge to hold SLR, but it has all the same features in a compact little sweetly orange package. I carry it everywhere I go and wish I had bought it a long time ago...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute but little else
customer_reviews.text: I was so eager to love this camera. I even pre-ordered it weeks in advance. Unfortunately I had to return it the next day -- the shots taken with this camera were not good at all. If you're into cute and don't care about image quality, than this is the camera for you (this one or possibly a Casio, which to my eyes makes the cutest cameras out there). But if you're looking for photographic quality, I'd suggest you look elsewhere, perhaps to Canon or Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchached this camera for the color but found the features are fabulous. It is extremely easy to use and the picture quality is amazing. I have already purchased others for family members. It arrives quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix Z10fd 7.2MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera malfunctioned even before we could take a first picture with it. The battery got stuck inside, refused to pop out, and the camera could not take pictures. We called Fuji and sent it back to them. It is 4 weeks later and we are still to receive the camera back. They did acknowledge receipt of the product and are fixing it. I am pretty disappointed that we did not even use the camera once before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my girls' birthdays and now want one for myself. These are high-quality, economical, and easy to use point-and-shoots. Very close and clear focusing allows great flower shots...And the girls went nuts over the hot pink! Another quality product from a quality company.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Forrester

customer_reviews.title: pink camera
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for this specific hot pink camera and amazon had it for a great price new! I was also able to get shipping at a discount and arrived less than a week.My daughter's school trip was complete and took great pictures. The process was easy in ordering it. This was my first time using amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kielasa-frontera

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I was looking for a small and reasonably priced point and shoot. This camera fit the bill perfectly. The camera powers up quickly, and the image quality is decent for a point and shoot. I believe this is a great camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Felton

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the $
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this camera as a present, prior we were using the finepix 2 megapix from 2001, we thought that was OK just humungus! This fuji Z10 is so tiny but takes great pics and even better videos. He was so happy with this gift, we would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Blair N. Sellon

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Z10fd  7.2MP Digital Camera with 3X OPTICAL
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up on Christmas morning and the pictures were as good as the Olympic 7.2MP as my parents own and paid much more. The only thing I was disappointed in is that there was no cartiage which made it difficult to store pictures as the hard drive was limited. Keep up the effort in coming up with an affordable good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mansell

customer_reviews.title: Cam Fanatic
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, one of the best cameras on the market. I use it almost everyday. Great for just pictures with friends or family, or semi-professional photos.
customer_reviews.author: Micky T

customer_reviews.title: fuji finepix
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 12 year old daughter as a Christmas gift. She loved it. It is extremely easy to use and compact. Would definetly recommend this model for anyone. Amazon made my first experience purchasing on the internet very easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 1st time camara
customer_reviews.text: This camara has taken pretty nice pictures in different lights and settings. I think it is a pretty good camara for a first timer, it is very light and easy to carry.As well as a a big screen, sleek disign and an eye-poping color.
customer_reviews.author: DMO

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is great. Good picture quality, easy to use, charge, and carry. Software easy to install and use. Many colors to choose from. Could have a little better zoom, but for the money, a winner.
customer_reviews.author: L Johns

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix Z10
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter and she loves it. From the pictures I saw that she had taken, they were very clear with great detail. I've always liked Fuji products and still do.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hand

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal, 10% lower than anywhere else. My teen daughter is impressed with the ease of use and the quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. has plenty of features for one at this price point. Takes great pictures as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I took more than 1000 pictures and many movies and upload Youtube. It is very good and I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Noriko Asami

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: little late in the mail but could have been ups fault got what i paid for
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Smeltzer

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: i love my cam cam, i named her Lisa. That's how much I love it
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Yinka Odeneye

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Finepix Z10fd 7.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Midnight Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
The FinePix Z10fd is a slim 7.2-megapixel digital camera, wrapped in the stylish curves and rounded edges of a slim 20.5mm body with a choice of five vivid colors: Midnight Black, Hot Pink, Sunset Orange, Wasabi Green, and Wave Blue. In addition to its sleek and compact body, the Z10fd packed with stunning technologies designed to offer beautiful images and fun playback functions. 

 

The ergonomic design of the FinePix Z10fd fits comfortably in your hand, enabling users to carry it around anytime. It features the traditional Z-series lens cover, and has a 2.5-inch LCD and simple button layout on the back side of the camera. These features make the camera easy and fun to operate.  Offering high-resolution 7.2-megapixel photos, the FinePix Z10fd also boasts the acclaimed Fujifilm’s high sensitivity up to ISO 1600 at full resolution and enables users to take bright and blur-free photos. In addition, Z10fd is equipped with the hardware-based Face Detection Technology. Point at the subject, and the camera will immediately find up to 10 human faces in the frame and automatically optimize AE and AF on the detected faces. Additionally, the FinePix Z10fd features the newly developed Auto Red Eye Removal, which leverages Face Detection’s strengths to do its job. This system finds red-eye on the human faces, and corrects it automatically within a few seconds as the shot is taken. There are additional features of the Face Detection in the playback mode, such as cropping, zooming in, and slide show. 

 Fuji FinePix Z10fd Highlights 

 

Face Detection technology The new Z10fd Finepix digital still camera features Face Detection to significantly improve your picture taking by identifying human subjects' faces in the frame (up to 10 faces) and in real time, determining the optimal focus and exposure settings for the absolute best results possible in any shooting conditions. Behind Fujifilm's Face Detection technology is a newly developed LSI chip combined with patented software that allows the FinePix Z10fd digital still camera to reach a level of performance in digital photography never before possible.  Picture Stabilization Technology The FinePix Z10fd with Picture Stabilization will automate professional photographic techniques to help reduce camera shake, freeze subject movement and improve low light background detail. Picture Stabilization utilizes higher sensitivities, up to ISO 1600 in the Z10fd, an incredibly high signal to noise ratio, and faster shutter and operational speeds to deliver virtually blur free images where conventional digital cameras cannot. 

 IrSimple wireless transfer Transfer your images quickly and easily from your FinePix Z10fd to any IrSimple-equipped device. A fast infrared technology, IrSimple makes getting those photos out of your camera a breeze. Want to share with your friends? No problem, you can even transfer images to another IrSimple equipped camera too! 

 

Five Unique Color and Finish Designs The FinePix Z10fd is designed with style and fashion in mind for the youthful photographer that’s on the move. Five exciting and vibrant color schemes are available: Midnight Black, Hot Pink, Sunset Orange, Wasabi Green, and Wave Blue.  xD/SD-compatible slot The Finepix Z10fd features an xD/SD compatible slot, allowing the use of either xD Picture Card or SD media to store and transfer your photos. This convenient and flexible capability assures compatibility with a wider variety of applications than ever before, and allows users to choose the media technology that is right for them. 

 

Blog Mode copies images for easy e-mail & web sharing Now you can post pictures to Blogs, Websites, or Auctions or email with ease. The Z10fd features a new Blog Mode feature that will automatically resize any image you’ve captured to a 640x480 (VGA) image size, right in the camera, with the touch of a button! Your original high resolution image is saved, and an additional VGA image file is created for use in web applications or email where smaller file sizes and faster load times are needed. No editing software or additional work is necessary. Just push the button and upload!  What's in the box 

 Fujifilm Finepix Z10 digital camera, Li-ion cattery NP-45, battery charger BC-45, strap, AV cable, USB cable, CD-ROM, owner's manual
